probablePitcher.note: Minor was scratched from his last start because of back tightness. He has won his last three starts and is 5-2 with a 3.53 ERA in his last 11 starts. He started against the A's on July 24 in Arlington and allowed two runs in five innings.

Jackson allowed a pair of solo homers to the Astros in five innings on Friday, snapping a streak of 22 2/3 innings without allowing an earned run. He allowed five runs in 4 1/3 innings to the Rangers on July 25.
